about_the_game:
Severely lacking in common sense, Sophie is a curious and horny human girl with a little extra between her legs. After waking in an unknown location, Sophie quickly came to realize what her unique body was yearning for.

As a powerful demon, Vail has lived a longer life than most, and has been around for much of The Grand War. Many do not look kindly on demons, and Vail's stature is far from inviting. Thus, she has spent most of the recent years alone, being shunned by those around her.

A lifelong priestess of the Goddess of Love, the high elf Lucia's age is not known to many, and she rarely strays far from her church. Despite what her calm exterior and complete devotion may suggest, even she may wish for more than her duties.

Having left her noble family behind, the centaur journeyed forth to find new purpose. Respected and proud, Adelaide now struggles to find a suitable purpose, and hopefully a mate to match.

Like many fairies, Fii isn't too fond of any of the other species, and has spent a majority of her life living alone in the forest. Skilled in magic, but with a weak physical form, she avoids contact with most people.

The owner and only employee of the local inn, tavern, and guild, all of which she established herself. Karla grew up in a small forest town during The Grand War, listening to the stories of amazing adventurers and guilds in the capital. Together with her childhood friend, Eve, she hopes to one day have stories told of her.

Eve has spent most of her life in the same small town she was born in. She is one of very few adventurers in the area, being the first to join the guild established by her childhood friend, Karla. Her excited personality makes it easy for her to make friends, but she's not great with confrontation.

  • High-quality illustrations in full HD, 1080p.

  • 20.000+ words.

  • NSFW sound effects. (Optional)

  • 8 Live2D-animated scenes. (Animation is optional)

  • Full voice acting and narration. (Optional)

content_descriptors.notes:
Born to Breed contains no blood or gore of any kind.
Pornographic futanari/intersex and female illustrations make up a majority of content. Some characters - such as a centaur - have animal traits. One character is very small, and is involved in size difference content. There is also a single instance of sexual gratification involving a plant.

There are also mild discussions/implications of forced war-time sexual acts, including forced impregnation. This is never depicted nor described in detail.
Mild drinking also appears.

detailed_description:
Severely lacking in common sense, Sophie is a curious and horny human girl with a little extra between her legs. After waking in an unknown location, Sophie quickly came to realize what her unique body was yearning for.

As a powerful demon, Vail has lived a longer life than most, and has been around for much of The Grand War. Many do not look kindly on demons, and Vail's stature is far from inviting. Thus, she has spent most of the recent years alone, being shunned by those around her.

A lifelong priestess of the Goddess of Love, the high elf Lucia's age is not known to many, and she rarely strays far from her church. Despite what her calm exterior and complete devotion may suggest, even she may wish for more than her duties.

Having left her noble family behind, the centaur journeyed forth to find new purpose. Respected and proud, Adelaide now struggles to find a suitable purpose, and hopefully a mate to match.

Like many fairies, Fii isn't too fond of any of the other species, and has spent a majority of her life living alone in the forest. Skilled in magic, but with a weak physical form, she avoids contact with most people.

The owner and only employee of the local inn, tavern, and guild, all of which she established herself. Karla grew up in a small forest town during The Grand War, listening to the stories of amazing adventurers and guilds in the capital. Together with her childhood friend, Eve, she hopes to one day have stories told of her.

Eve has spent most of her life in the same small town she was born in. She is one of very few adventurers in the area, being the first to join the guild established by her childhood friend, Karla. Her excited personality makes it easy for her to make friends, but she's not great with confrontation.

  • High-quality illustrations in full HD, 1080p.

  • 20.000+ words.

  • NSFW sound effects. (Optional)

  • 8 Live2D-animated scenes. (Animation is optional)

  • Full voice acting and narration. (Optional)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: Born to Breed

  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: A futanari visual novel where you can breed with centaurs, goblins, and more. Features Live2D animation and full voice acting.
